name: In Afterlife
description:
This is my submission for the Weekly Game Jam 130

The game jam theme was : "Dying is rewarded" 

  • How did i implemented the them in my game ?

The player is a slime with the power of becoming a ghost whenever he die. While being a ghost you can move freely in the level and take others slimes body to revive.

Due to lack of time i didn't manage to implement sound / music in the game (sorry for that)

  • Controls

Arrows -- to move (or WASD)

R -- to retry

T -- to warp to the levels hub

Escape -- to leave the game (Be careful if you quit, progress will be reset)
